dataList.dlg: That bastard… has to be alive still.
This is how I will chart my own path…
This is going to be one bumpy voyage. Everyone, hold on to something!
Chart your own way. Your path. That is my wish.
Wheehee! I’ll enwrap it… enrapture it.
Though I can’t guide you… I can offer a warm embrace.
Do you see? My writhing struggle, hoping the world is cocooned in flames with me…
Must be here… Oh, was it that way?

All hands, full speed toward where the lights flicker.
The waves... will lay waste to everything in our way.
To the sea, to the sea. All hands, abandon ship and descend. Into the flickering depths we sink.
To the sea, to the sea. All hands, abandon ship and descend. Into the flickering depths we sink.
